abstrac: Software Architects & Engineers | Web | Mobile | Bots | Scripts | Automation - Your Partners in Everything Digital
bio:
ExcellaTek offers web design, web development, and mobile application development services for many industries, ranging from simple e-commerce solutions to mobile apps and the most complex web applications.

Building trust is key to the success of any business, that is something we firmly believe in. Whether you're new to the industry or have built any number of websites/applications in the past, you're guaranteed to get the best service and quality from us every single time.

We follow a four-point development approach for each project:

1) Define: We discuss the needs of the customer and the project's scope.
We chat with you about your objectives and offer any necessary advice.

2) Design: Using wireframes and UI prototypes, we bring visual clarity to your ideas.

3) Develop: We follow a phased, agile-like development process which involves you, the customer, as much as possible so you always know the status of your project. You remain at the forefront.

4) Deploy: We offer server deployment, maintenance services, and full integration with your current systems. 

Technological Expertise:

• Desktop: C++/Qt, .Net, Java, Ruby / On Rails
• Web: React, Angular, Wordpress, Node.js, Python / DJango, PHP/Laravel/Yii/Magento, .Net, Java, AWS Serverless Computing, Twilio
• Mobile: React Native, Ionic, Xamarin, Cordova, Flutter, Objective C, SWIFT, Java
• Bots / Scripts: Python / DJango, Selenium, PHP, C#, VB.Net, Javascript, C++
• Databases: SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MS SQL and NoSQL),MongoDB, Dynamo, Firebase
• System and Software Architecture: Micro-services Architecture, Multi-tenant Architectures, Multi-tier Architecture
• DevOps: AWS, Google Cloud, CI/CD, Containers - Docker/Kubernetes
• Firmware, ARM Microcontroller, Raspberry Pi Firmware, AVR Microcontroller
• Advanced Software Solutions: 3D/2D Graphics, Image Processing, AR/VR, Computer Vision, D Algorithmic (OpenCV, CUDA, Vuforia/Google VR/ARKit, Three.js, WebAssembly), Twilio

Best,

Ken
Flexible

bio:
Hello. I am a software engineer with 10+ years of experience focusing on mobile applications and worked with a talented, experienced team to establish mobile design patterns, development workflow, and code solutions for native mobile apps for Android and iOS. (Objective-C/Swift, Java/Kotlin)

My expertise is to design and develop games used to connect to devices, visualize sensors, play video games. Developed game apps across multiple platforms to include iOS, Android, IoT, TV and VR.

I am also an expert Unity developer with many projects under my belt ranging from mobile games to VR/AR to physical devices. I am just as comfortable writing fancy shaders as I am writing AI algorithms or designing fun and engaging puzzle games.

For the last 5 years, we provided mobile architecture leadership and cross-platform coding expertise for Android, iOS, TV and Windows. (React/React Native, Flutter/Dart).

Our passion lies in providing the best user experience through beautiful and intuitive UI design.

I hope to impact as many projects as possible through the Guru community.
Cheers.

Only for Remote jobs.

40+hrs/week in US time zone.

bio:
Colan Infotech - IT professional services company an offshore software development firm located in India and holds a strong reputation in IT market for helping clients across USA, Canada & UK.

Our areas of expertise are Oracle (DB, ERP), Microsoft, SAP, CRM, Java, BI, Cloud Computing, ASP.NET, Mobile Applications, PHP, Magento, Drupal, Wordpress and much more. When we say development, it includes customization, integration, redefining existing architecture, support and implementation. When it comes to Quality, we are very keen on this area and this made us to capture a good name and stretch our population of 200+ professionals.

Working either on stand-alone projects or with your development team, our goal is to ensure that you get the best possible quality and delivery for your money in addition to seamlessly integrating with your processes and people for a good all-round experience. Kindly consider providing an opportunity to prove our capabilities.

Communication: You can reach us at any time via the following mediums,

Engagement Model -
• Fixed Bid – Fixed price/scope, any future enhancement would be considered as Change Request and billed separately
• Time & Material – “Pay as you use” Model, 
• Retainer – Monthly Billing engagement, where a dedicated developer would be made available to work 180 hours per month

Communication Mechanisms -
• Email: All status updates, meeting requests, agenda’s and minutes of the meeting.
• Telephone: Conference calls shall be the default method for all weekly status update meetings to discuss current project status as well as to discuss all escalations (if any).
• Instant Messaging: Various types of IM would be used for online, real time communication between team members and stakeholders.
• LiveMeeting: COLAN Infotech uses WebEx to enable real-time desktop and application sharing features between the teams.

b) 30% on approval of design 
c) 25% on milestones completion, 
c) 25% (remaining) final payment on project completion and handing over site to clients possesion with QC and full testing

abstrac: What do you want? I am ready for you.
bio:
My name is Ke.Chankrisna from Cambodia.
Taking a developer job as a profession not only fulfills my pocket but also my heart because it has been my passion since my early teenage.

I believe that people should do things in which they are good at or in which their heart lays.
I graduated from Build Bright University with Computer Science, so I have solid knowledge and experience in web and mobile development.
I have 8 years of professional experience at an IT service company.
During the time, I worked with several developer roles such as backend developer, frontend developer, Project manager, etc.
What I can deliver for you?

- Web and mobile front-end development
  * Web front-end development using React JS(or React TypeScript, Next JS), Angular(from 6-11), Vue JS(or 
    Vue TypeScript, Nuxt JS), Svelte framework.
    Fully responsive, pixel perfect, user-friendly design, Flexible API integration
  * Mobile
    Uber, fitness, Food delivery, Booking, Schedule, Location tracking, a dating app
    (social sharing, deep-link, booking logic, payment gateway integration)
   React Native, Ionic, Kotlin, Swift
   * Hubspot CMS development
- Back-end Development
  * Rails, Django, Node js, Nest js, PHP, Laravel, ASP.NET.
  * Serverless
  * AWS Lambda, API gateway, Cloud formation, S3.
  * Code Pipeline, Code Build, Code commit.
  * AWS Cognito,  SES, SNS, SQS, RDS, Elastic Beanstalk, AWS Transcribe, AWS Glue, Kinesis, ECS, EC2, EKS, DynamoDB, DocumentDB
  * Nginx, Apache2
  * No SQL, SQL Databases.
-Stripe payment gateway integration.
- Infrastructure as Code (AWS CDK, Terraform, CDK for Terraform, CDK for Kubernetes, Cloudformation)
I pride myself on providing the highest quality of work, and will never complete a project until the client is 100% satisfied.
Let's work together to implement your great ideas!

Full Time Available
Free Bug Fix (on a project I worked on)
Free Consultation
Free Deployment (on a project I worked on)
I can work 40~60 hours per week.
All communication will be done on the guru, but skype or discord, slack is also preferred.
Any TimeZone Available

abstrac: React | Vue | Angular | Node | Full-Stack Developer
bio:
I am an experienced Angular | React | Vue | Node | Python developer, looking for exciting projects and new opportunities.
Expert Web Front-End Developer ready to take on your project.
You deserve a website that is built with security, responsiveness, functionality, and efficiency in mind.
Over the last 10+ years, I have worked in all kinds of projects and I am able to build a web application from scratch very fast and with great efficiency or continue working on existing code with ease.

SKILL
o Back-end (NodeJS/Python & Django/Core PHP/Laravel/Symfony)
o Front-end(ReactJS/Redux, VueJS/Vuex/NuxtJS, AngularJS, Angular/Ngrx)
o DB (MySQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Firebase)
o HTML5 / XHTML / CSS3 / Javascript/Bootstrap
o Chrome extension development.
o UnitTesting (Mocha, Chai, Jest, Puppeteer-Jest, Phantom)
o Responsible communication for each day(24/7 online).
o  2 months Free bug fixing and maintenance

I look forward to taking on your project and building you a site you are proud of

I can work at most 40 hours per week.
My hourly rate is $40~$60
I can work fulltime and I can work in the weekend if client want.
I hope to communicate via slack, skype, google hangout.
Thanks
